successDesc:
Change is inevitable; it is simply a part of the natural flow.

So are those who are changed by truth.

One who sought to remain on the side of good, upon realizing that there was no evil left in the world, came to fill its absence herself.

And here is the one who despaired upon seeing all that she swore to protect turn to dust.

Change comes for everything, eventually.

To accept the changes, gather the falling tears and whet the sword keen, for the flow cannot be stemmed.
failureDesc:
This half-hearted attempt at sympathy only serves to plunge the dark-dipped one deeper into the abyssal black sea.

The knight who failed to scour even a crumb of hope will now plummet to the depths with the heavy yoke of despair,

fading from people's memory, just like the others.

successDesc:
Just how much weight did she carry in that lone word, 'protect'?

The knight reacts, shaken by what was conveyed.

She must have pitied the Sinner, who expressed that they carry the same pain that she does;

though it has now fallen out of use, like the tip of a shorn pencil that has seen too many papers...

... she bestows upon them a blessing, its shadows radiant.
failureDesc:
This half-hearted attempt at sympathy only serves to plunge the dark-dipped one deeper into the abyssal black sea.

successDesc:
"Is that... true?"

While she didn't seem to fully agree to what {0} said, it seems that it managed to alleviate some of her anxiety.

"Thanks. I must've been... thinking about it too negatively."

The girl smiles brightly as she hands something to {0}.

"This is a token of our friendship. Please take it!"

"And don't forget to call me when there's evil afoot, okay?"

... But I'm not sure how much longer this chipper attitude will last.
failureDesc:
"... You're full of it."

That didn't work.

The shuddering comes to a sudden stop. The girl seems to have reached a conclusion.

"That's how it's supposed to be... The good me can exist again, if I become evil."

She levitates slowly into the air, before azure spears appear from somewhere and skewer her.

An unsettling, serpentine creature manifests from within like it's breaking out of an egg before rapidly crawling out of the Containment Unit.
